thread.title: Timbers coach Caleb Porter on the playoffs: 'The players answered the call'
thread.title_full: Timbers coach Caleb Porter on the playoffs: 'The players answered the call' | OregonLive.com

author: Molly Blue | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Timbers coach Caleb Porter on the playoffs: 'The players answered the call'
text:
From hovering around the red line to vaulting up to the No. 3 spot in Major League Soccer's Western Conference, Caleb Porter talked Sunday night about how his Portland Timbers are peaking at the right time after the 4-1 win against the Colorado Rapids at Providence Park.
Behind a first-half brace from Darlington Nagbe , the Timbers clinched a spot in the postseason and will play host to Sporting Kansas City on Thursday.
"Three games ago, these guys were under pressure and we were being questioned, for good reason. We weren't getting the job done," Porter said. "The players answered the call."
